name: Trevenant
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

abilities.name: Forest’s Curse
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can’t play any Item cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Tree Slam
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
